settings.block_paragraph: If you’re an athlete or looking for intense cold therapy, we recommend the 1.5 HP Wi-Fi Water Chiller. With maximum cooling power and smart controls, it’s perfect for regular use after tough workouts. With a 3500 W cooling and 5000 W heating power.
settings.button_text: Warrior Ultra 1.5 HP Wi-Fi Water Chiller + Heater

settings.block_paragraph: If you need both cooling and heating options, the Warrior Max 1 HP Wi-Fi Water Chiller + Heater is ideal for all-year-round use, whether you want a cold plunge or warm recovery session. With a 2600 W cooling and 3300 W heating power.
settings.button_text: Warrior Max 1 HP Wi-Fi Water Chiller + Heater

settings.block_paragraph: For users who want portability and simplicity, the 1 HP Water Chiller is the most portable option, offering reliable cooling for daily cold plunges without complicated setup. With a 2600 W cooling power.
settings.button_text: 1 HP Water Chiller For Ice Bath

settings.block_paragraph: For users with limited space or just starting with cold therapy, the Warrior Water Chiller PRO. provides effective cooling in a more compact design. With a 1200 W cooling power.
settings.button_text: Warrior Water Chiller PRO For Ice Bath | Cold Plunge Chiller

settings.faq_heading: Do I need to add ice to my ice bath?
settings.faq_answer: No, with our reliable water chillers, there’s no need to add ice. Our ice bath water chillers keep your water clean and cold at your desired temperature for as long as you need. This saves you a lot of maintenance time so you can focus on more important things.

settings.faq_heading: Are your water chillers easy to set up?
settings.faq_answer: Yes, our water chillers are designed to be user-friendly and come with clear instructions. With plug-and-play functionality, you can easily set them up at home. Plus, with Wi-Fi controls, managing your chiller remotely makes it even simpler to operate.

settings.faq_heading: How do I maintain my water chiller?
settings.faq_answer: Maintenance is simple! Our water chillers have a built-in filtration system that keeps your water crystal clean and sanitized. Check the filter regularly and replace it when it turns brown. Keep your chiller at least 15-20" from the wall to allow easy exhaust for the heated air from its fan.

settings.faq_heading: What should I consider when choosing a water chiller?
settings.faq_answer:
When selecting a water chiller, consider factors like horse power, ice bath water volume, and features like Wi-Fi control and filtration.

For large tubs or frequent use, our 1HP Wi-Fi chiller is the perfect choice for optimal cooling and convenience.
We offer fast, reliable shipping across the USA. Orders are typically delivered within 2-6 business days across mainland US. Delivery to Canada and Hawaii takes about a week longer.

settings.faq_heading: Can I return my ice bath water chiller if I’m not satisfied?
settings.faq_answer:
Absolutely. We offer a 60-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not fully satisfied with your water chiller, contact us to return it, and we'll assist you.
Beware - most companies that sell water chillers on the market are new and often don't follow their return policy.
Research reviews on YouTube and other independent sources before investing your hard-earned money, as this is a significant investment.

settings.faq_heading: What is covered under the warranty for the Warrior Willpower water chiller?
settings.faq_answer: Our cold plunge water chillers come with a comprehensive warranty that covers defects in materials and workmanship. If you experience any issues within the warranty period, we’ll repair or replace the unit entirely for free to ensure your complete satisfaction.

settings.paragraph: Have you got questions? We've got answers!
settings.section_top_heading: Need Help? We’ve Got You Covered
settings.section_top_paragraph: Dive into our FAQ section to learn more about the benefits, features, and usage of our products to better meet your needs.
